dcterms:description: Mobile ad hoc computing (MAHC) allows mobile devices to directly share their computing resources, addressing the growing demands for computing resources required by mobile devices.
dcterms:title: Mobile Ad Hoc Computing (MAHC)

dcterms:creator: B. Wang
J. Xie
S. Li
Y. Wan
Y. Gu
S. Fu
K. Lu
dcterms:description: This dataset involves the use of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) to create a networked airborne computing system that allows UAVs to share resources through direct flight-to-flight communications.
dcterms:title: Unmanned Aerial Vehicles (UAVs)

dcterms:creator: K. Lee
R. Pedarsani
D. Papailiopoulos
K. Ramchandran
dcterms:description: Coded computation for multicore setups is a technique that improves the resilience of distributed computing systems to uncertain system disturbances.
dcterms:title: Coded Computation for Multicore Setups

dcterms:creator: K. Zhang
Z. Yang
T. BasÂ¸ar
dcterms:description: Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning (MARL) is a framework that involves multiple agents interacting in an environment, applicable to various tasks including computation offloading.
dcterms:title: Multi-Agent Reinforcement Learning (MARL)

dcterms:creator: A. Reisizadeh
S. Prakash
R. Pedarsani
S. Avestimehr
dcterms:description: Coded computation over heterogeneous clusters maximizes expected computing results received by the master node in distributed systems with varying node capabilities.
dcterms:title: Coded Computation over Heterogeneous Clusters

dcterms:creator: B. Wang
J. Xie
K. Lu
Y. Wan
S. Fu
dcterms:description: Batch processing based coded computing allows partial results to be returned and is designed for heterogeneous distributed computing systems.
dcterms:title: Batch Processing Based Coded Computing

dcterms:creator: Y. Keshtkarjahromi
Y. Xing
H. Seferoglu
dcterms:description: The Coded Cooperative Computation Protocol (C3P) dynamically allocates tasks in mobile computing systems based on the time lag between tasks.
dcterms:title: Coded Cooperative Computation Protocol (C3P)

dcterms:creator: A. Reisizadeh
S. Prakash
R. Pedarsani
A. S. Avestimehr
dcterms:description: Load-Balanced Uncoded Scheme divides computation loads according to the computing capabilities of worker nodes, optimizing task completion times.
dcterms:title: Load-Balanced Uncoded Scheme
